body: any reason for the rename here? This will just cause conflicts and increase the git history without any benefit.
It's to have the log print "CheckAddrMan:" instead of "Check_:"
Concept ACK
Concept ACK
All the method names seem to end with `_`, might want to keep that at least for consistency?
Concept ACK
Done, updated the pull description

Looks like this will print the statistics twice, implying they would change in-between, which might be confusing.

Not sure how to best solve this.

> Looks like this will print the statistics twice, implying they would change in-between, which might be confusing.
> 
> Not sure how to best solve this.

I'll have a look.

unrelated idea:

The following log could also be improved with this new macro:

```
src/validation.cpp:                LogPrintf("[snapshot] flushing coins cache (%.2f MB)... ", /* Continued */
diff_hunk:
@@ -91,6 +100,8 @@ class Timer
     BCLog::Timer<std::chrono::microseconds> PASTE2(logging_timer, __COUNTER__)(__func__, end_msg, log_category)
 #define LOG_TIME_MILLIS_WITH_CATEGORY(end_msg, log_category) \
     BCLog::Timer<std::chrono::milliseconds> PASTE2(logging_timer, __COUNTER__)(__func__, end_msg, log_category)
+#define LOG_TIME_MILLIS_WITH_CATEGORY_MSG_ONCE(end_msg, log_category) \
+    BCLog::Timer<std::chrono::milliseconds> PASTE2(logging_timer, __COUNTER__)(__func__, end_msg, log_category, /* msg_on_completion=*/false)
